name: ST-01
description: V4w.enko - "ST-01". Pattern standardization experience is applied in "Spiral Theories" to generate real-time 3d massive. Basic Procedural patterns are applied with new spiral organizing instructions. The 3d camera is flying around the sides of the virtual 3d artwork`s canvas. Now we have possibility to know how the Pattern standardization experience and procedural  3D practice are getting connected.
